author: Special Correspondent
text:
School students were exposed to career opportunities available in the horticulture and agriculture sector and the recent developments in agricultural research, especially in banana cultivation, during the National Science Day celebrated by the National Research Centre for Banana (NRCB) here on Monday.

Around 350 school students from Tiruchi and Karur districts participated in the celebrations at the NRCB during which they were showcased the research activities of the institute and the advanced technologies developed on various aspects of banana production.

The National Science Day was celebrated by the NRCB with the objective of exposing the recent developments in agricultural research particularly in banana to the students with a view to creating awareness among them.

Scientists and researchers of the institute explained to the students the career opportunities available in horticulture and agriculture.

B. Padmanaban, Director, NRCB, outlined the career opportunities in agriculture.
title: Students exposed to career in farm sector
